files.name: docy-avatar/utils.ts
docy-avatar/types.ts
files.content:
export type AvatarSize = "xs" | "sm" | "md" | "lg" | "xl" | "2xl" | "3xl" | "4xl" | "5xl" | "max"
export type UserStatus = "online" | "offline" | "away"

export interface User {
  userId: string | number
  firstname: string
  lastname: string
  name?: string
  photo?: string
  color?: string
  status?: UserStatus
  fullname?: string
}


export const DEFAULT_AVATAR_SIZE = "sm" as const
export const DEFAULT_MAX_ITEMS = 5 as const


export const STATUS_COLORS = {
  online: "bg-green-400",
  offline: "bg-red-400", 
  away: "bg-amber-400"
} as const

export const AVATAR_COLORS = [
  "bg-red-500",
  "bg-orange-500", 
  "bg-amber-500",
  "bg-yellow-500",
  "bg-lime-500",
  "bg-green-500",
  "bg-emerald-500",
  "bg-teal-500",
  "bg-cyan-500",
  "bg-sky-500",
  "bg-blue-500",
  "bg-indigo-500",
  "bg-violet-500",
  "bg-purple-500",
  "bg-fuchsia-500",
  "bg-pink-500",
  "bg-rose-500",
  "bg-slate-500/80"
] as const

docy-button/types.ts
files.content:
export type ButtonVariant = 
  | "default" 
  | "destructive" 
  | "outline" 
  | "secondary" 
  | "ghost" 
  | "link"

export type ButtonSize = 
  | "default" 
  | "sm" 
  | "lg" 
  | "icon"

export type IconPosition = "left" | "right"

export const DEFAULT_VARIANT: ButtonVariant = "default"
export const DEFAULT_SIZE: ButtonSize = "default"
export const DEFAULT_ICON_POSITION: IconPosition = "left"
export const DEFAULT_CONFIRM_TIMEOUT = 3000

export interface ConfirmationState {
  isConfirming: boolean
  timeRemaining: number
  progressPercentage: number
}

files.name: docy-button/index.ts
files.content:
export { DocyButton, buttonVariants } from "./docy-button"
export type { DocyButtonProps } from "./docy-button"
export type { 
  ButtonVariant, 
  ButtonSize, 
  IconPosition, 
  ConfirmationState 
} from "./types"
export {
  DEFAULT_VARIANT,
  DEFAULT_SIZE,
  DEFAULT_ICON_POSITION,
  DEFAULT_CONFIRM_TIMEOUT
} from "./types"

export { DocyButton as default } from "./docy-button"

files.name: docy-button/example.tsx
files.content:
import * as React from "react" import DocyButton from "./docy-button" export function DocyButtonExample() { const [loading, setLoading] = React.useState(false) const [clickCount, setClickCount] = React.useState(0) const handleAsyncAction = async () => { setLoading(true) // Simulate async operation await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2000)) setLoading(false) setClickCount(prev => prev + 1) } const handleDestructiveAction = () => { alert("Destructive action confirmed!") setClickCount(prev => prev + 1) } return (

DocyButton Examples

Comprehensive examples of the DocyButton component with all variants and features.

Button clicks: {clickCount}

{/* Basic Variants */}

Button Variants

setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Default setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Destructive setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Outline setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Secondary setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Ghost setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Link
{/* Button Sizes */}

Button Sizes

setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Small setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Default setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Large setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > ⭐
{/* Icons */}

Buttons with Icons

setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Save setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Download setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} /> setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Delete
{/* Loading States */}

Loading States

{loading ? "Processing..." : "Start Process"} Save Document Always Loading
{/* Destructive Confirmation */}

Destructive Confirmation

Delete Item Delete All Remove User
{/* Full Width */}

Full Width

setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Full Width Button setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Continue to Next Step
{/* Disabled States */}

Disabled States

Disabled Default Disabled Destructive Disabled Loading
{/* Complex Examples */}

Complex Examples

Form Actions

setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Cancel Save Changes

Dangerous Action with Confirmation

alert("Account deleted!")} > Delete Account

Call-to-Action

setClickCount(prev => prev + 1)} > Get Started Now
) } export default DocyButtonExample

docy-chip/types.ts
files.content:
export type ChipSize = "3xs" | "2xs" | "xs" | "sm" | "md" | "lg" | "xl" | "xxl"
export type ChipVariant = "light" | "dark"
export type ChipColor = 
  | "slate" 
  | "slateDarker"
  | "white"
  | "opaque"
  | "gray"
  | "zinc"
  | "stone"
  | "neutral"
  | "blue"
  | "green"
  | "orange"
  | "red"
  | "rose"
  | "violet"
  | "yellow"

// Constants for better maintainability
export const DEFAULT_CHIP_SIZE = "sm" as const
export const DEFAULT_CHIP_VARIANT = "light" as const
export const DEFAULT_CHIP_COLOR = "slate" as const

// Supported color palettes following ShadCN patterns
export const SUPPORTED_COLORS: ChipColor[] = [
  "slate",
  "slateDarker", 
  "white",
  "opaque",
  "gray",
  "zinc",
  "stone", 
  "neutral",
  "blue",
  "green",
  "orange",
  "red",
  "rose",
  "violet",
  "yellow"
]

docy-icon/utils.ts
docy-icon/types.ts
files.content:
export type IconSize = "xs" | "sm" | "md" | "lg" | "xl" | "2xl"
export type IconLibrary = "lucide" | "heroicons" | "tabler" | "phosphor" | "custom"  
export type IconAnimation = "spin" | "pulse" | "bounce"

// Constants for better maintainability
export const DEFAULT_ICON_SIZE = "md" as const
export const DEFAULT_ICON_LIB = "lucide" as const
export const DEFAULT_STROKE_WIDTH = 1.5 as const
export const SIZE_VALIDATION_RANGE = { min: 4, max: 200 } as const

export interface IconSizeMap {
  xs: 12
  sm: 14
  md: 20
  lg: 24
  xl: 28
  "2xl": 32
}

export interface IconLibraryConfig {
  name: IconLibrary
  displayName: string
  packageName?: string
  importPath?: string
  isInstalled: boolean
}

export const SUPPORTED_LIBRARIES: IconLibraryConfig[] = [
  {
    name: "lucide",
    displayName: "Lucide",
    packageName: "lucide-react",
    importPath: "lucide-react",
    isInstalled: true
  },
  {
    name: "heroicons", 
    displayName: "Heroicons",
    packageName: "@heroicons/react",
    importPath: "@heroicons/react",
    isInstalled: false
  },
  {
    name: "tabler",
    displayName: "Tabler Icons", 
    packageName: "@tabler/icons-react",
    importPath: "@tabler/icons-react",
    isInstalled: false
  },
  {
    name: "phosphor",
    displayName: "Phosphor Icons",
    packageName: "phosphor-react", 
    importPath: "phosphor-react",
    isInstalled: false
  },
  {
    name: "custom",
    displayName: "Custom Icons",
    isInstalled: true
  }
]

export type SpinnerSpeed = "slow" | "normal" | "fast"
export type SpinnerColor = "current" | "primary" | "secondary" | "muted" | "accent" | "destructive"

export const DEFAULT_SPINNER_SIZE = "default" as const
export const DEFAULT_SPINNER_SPEED = "normal" as const
export const DEFAULT_SPINNER_COLOR = "current" as const
